Sentencas: During operation, solid oxide fuel cell releases quite a great part of hydrogen energy into waste heat, leading to energy waste and even functional component degradation.
Titulo: Three-stage integration system with solid oxide fuel cell, alkali metal thermal electric converter and organic Rankine cycle for synergistic power generation

Sentencas: In this study, solid oxide fuel cell, alkali metal thermal electric converter and organic Rankine cycle are synergistically integrated as a three-stage integration system to gradually and efficiently utilize the waste heat.
Titulo: Three-stage integration system with solid oxide fuel cell, alkali metal thermal electric converter and organic Rankine cycle for synergistic power generation

Sentencas: Accounting a variety of thermodynamic-electrochemical losses within the system, mathematical expressions of power output, energy efficiency, exergy destruction rate, and exergy efficiency for the integration system are deduced.
Titulo: Three-stage integration system with solid oxide fuel cell, alkali metal thermal electric converter and organic Rankine cycle for synergistic power generation

Sentencas: The basic performance features and competitiveness of the integration system are revealed.
Titulo: Three-stage integration system with solid oxide fuel cell, alkali metal thermal electric converter and organic Rankine cycle for synergistic power generation

Sentencas: The maximum power output density of the proposed system allows to be 12407.0 W m- 2, which is approximately improved by 103.8 % compared to that of the stand-alone solid oxide fuel cell (6087.4 W m-2).
Titulo: Three-stage integration system with solid oxide fuel cell, alkali metal thermal electric converter and organic Rankine cycle for synergistic power generation

Sentencas: Parametric studies demonstrate that an increase in operation temperature, operation pressure or radiation loss geometric factor enhances the integration system performance, while an increase in beta ''-alumina solid electrolyte thickness, proportional coefficient or pinch temperature ratio degrades the integration system performance.
Titulo: Three-stage integration system with solid oxide fuel cell, alkali metal thermal electric converter and organic Rankine cycle for synergistic power generation

Sentencas: The results obtained can provide some theoretical support for designing or running such an actual three-stage integration system for efficient power generation.
Titulo: Three-stage integration system with solid oxide fuel cell, alkali metal thermal electric converter and organic Rankine cycle for synergistic power generation
